com.cyc.base.inference

Interface InferenceParameterGetter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InferenceParameters
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultInferenceParameters, Query, SpecifiedInferenceParameters

    public interface InferenceParameterGetter
    An interface defining the getters of Cyc inference parameters. Implementing classes allow the various parameters that govern how Cyc performs inference to be retrieved.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getAbductionAllowed() 
      InferenceAnswerLanguage getAnswerLanguage()
      Get the flavor of CycL to use for answers, or null if unspecified.
      DisjunctionFreeELVarsPolicy getDisjunctionFreeELVarsPolicy()
      Get the criteria for what to do when disjuncts have difference free variables.
      InferenceMode getInferenceMode()
      Get the inference mode to use.
      Integer getMaxNumber()
      Get the number cutoff.
      Integer getMaxTime() 
      Integer getMaxTransformationDepth() 
      InferenceMetrics getMetrics()
      Get the set of inference metrics to gather.
      ProblemReusePolicy getProblemReusePolicy()
      Get the criteria for when to try to reuse problems, or null if not specified.
      ProofValidationMode getProofValidationMode()
      Get the criteria for how carefully to check the intermediate proofs that are used in inference for semantic well-formedness, or null if unspecified.
      ResultUniqueness getResultUniqueness()
      Get the criteria for determining when two answers are the same, or null if unspecified.
      TransitiveClosureMode getTransitiveClosureMode()
      Get the criteria for determining when two answers are the same, or null if unspecified.
      Boolean isBrowsable() 
      Boolean isContinuable()

      • getDisjunctionFreeELVarsPolicy

        DisjunctionFreeELVarsPolicy getDisjunctionFreeELVarsPolicy()
        Get the criteria for what to do when disjuncts have difference free variables.
        Returns:
        the DisjunctionFreeELVarsPolicy, or null if unspecified.

      • getInferenceMode

        InferenceMode getInferenceMode()
        Get the inference mode to use. Inference modes are meant to be intuitive measures of how hard Cyc should work to answer a query. Setting the inference mode sets various other low-level parameters to appropriate values for that mode, but explictly setting values for such parameters overrides values set by the mode.
        Returns:
        the InferenceMode

      • getMaxNumber

        Integer getMaxNumber()
        Get the number cutoff. If this parameter is set to some number Cyc is licensed to stop work on an inference once it has found at least that many answers.
        Returns:
        the max number, or null if unlimited.

      • getMaxTime

        Integer getMaxTime()

      • getMaxTransformationDepth

        Integer getMaxTransformationDepth()

      • getMetrics

        InferenceMetrics getMetrics()
        Get the set of inference metrics to gather.
        Returns:
        the inference metrics.

      • getProblemReusePolicy

        ProblemReusePolicy getProblemReusePolicy()
        Get the criteria for when to try to reuse problems, or null if not specified.
        Returns:
        the ProblemReusePolicy, or null if unspecified.

      • getProofValidationMode

        ProofValidationMode getProofValidationMode()
        Get the criteria for how carefully to check the intermediate proofs that are used in inference for semantic well-formedness, or null if unspecified.
        Returns:
        the ResultUniqueness

      • getResultUniqueness

        ResultUniqueness getResultUniqueness()
        Get the criteria for determining when two answers are the same, or null if unspecified.
        Returns:
        the ResultUniqueness
